title: Karl Marx
brief_description: Academy award winner Bruce Petty has made this entertaining animation on the life and times of Karl Marx. Ambitious in its scope, the film attempts to put the economic history of Europe since the Industrial Revolution into a Marxist perspective. Narrators include Robyn Nevin, Arthur Dignam and Kate Fitzpatrick.
